billing_agreement.description: Certain regions require that you share your tax identification number (TIN) with Akamai. When you do, you need to acknowledge Akamai's [privacy statement](https://www.akamai.com/legal/privacy-statement) agreement, in regards to its protection. When set to `true`, you've acknowledged this agreement.

eu_model.description: The acknowledgement status for the [cross-border data transfer](https://www.akamai.com/legal/compliance/privacy-trust-center/cross-border-data-transfer-statement) agreement.

master_service_agreement.description: The acknowledgement status for Akamai's [master service agreement](https://www.linode.com/legal-msa/).
